mapper.select: SELECT i.intro_id, row_number() over(order BY i.intro_id desc) as NO,i.company_id, i.intro_title, i.intro_task, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_location, i.job_id, i.intro_image_id, c.company_name, i.intro_birth FROM intro i LEFT OUTER JOIN company c ON i.company_id = c.company_id

SELECT i.intro_id, c.company_name, i.intro_title, i.intro_task, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_location, i.intro_image_id, i.intro_birth, j.job_name, j.job_code, i.company_id FROM intro i LEFT OUTER JOIN company c ON i.company_id = c.company_id LEFT OUTER JOIN job j ON i.job_id = j.job_id WHERE intro_id = #{introId}
mapper.update: UPDATE intro i RIGHT JOIN company c ON (c.company_id = i.company_id) RIGHT JOIN job j ON (j.job_id = i.job_id) SET c.company_name = #{companyName}, i.intro_birth = #{introBirth}, i.intro_task = #{introTask}, i.intro_wellfare = #{introWellfare}, i.intro_sal = #{introSal}, i.intro_content = #{introContent}, i.intro_location = #{introLocation}, i.intro_image_id = #{introImageId}, j.job_name = #{jobName} WHERE i.intro_id = #{introId}
mapper.select: SELECT i.*, s.subscribe_id subscribeId, if(s.subscribe_id IS NULL, 0 ,1) isSubed, j.job_name, j.job_code, c.company_name FROM intro i LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM subscribe WHERE employee_id = #{principalId}) s ON i.company_id = s.company_id LEFT OUTER JOIN job j ON i.job_id = j.job_id LEFT OUTER JOIN company c ON i.company_id = c.company_id WHERE i.intro_id = #{introId}
